block.p: ROSENTHAL-Edna. On July 28, in Boca Raton, FL, aged 94. Beloved wife for 72 years of David. Devoted sister of Ruth Keiser, Selma Tull and the late Milton Lefcort. Mother of Joan Suskin and Charles. Mother-in-law of Murray Suskin and Phyllis. Grandmother of Thomas, Stephanie, Steven, Helen, Jane, James and Nicole. Great-grandmother of Barrie, Erica, Emily, Johanna and Charlie. Interment private.

ROSENTHAL-Edna. On July 28, in Boca Raton, FL, aged 94. Beloved wife for 72 years of David. Devoted sister of Ruth Keiser, Selma Tull and the late Milton Lefcort. Mother of Joan Suskin and Charles. Mother-in-law of Murray Suskin and Phyllis. Grandmother of Thomas, Stephanie, Steven, Helen, Jane, James and Nicole. Great-grandmother of Barrie, Erica, Emily, Johanna and Charlie. Interment private.
